set output '04.png'
set multiplot layout 1,1 rowsfirst title "PSO after 4 steps"
set xlabel 'dimension 0'
set ylabel 'dimension 1'
set xrange [-254.96236431295:200]
set yrange [-297.55684724183:224.99347567177]
set arrow from -4.8100186738547,-99.188147375393 to -91.674532016378,-297.55684724183

set label "(2)" at 0.26612818417637,-27.014122692746
set label "(3)" at -77.775001761817,24.230808900389
set grid
set arrow from -100,-100 to 100,-100 nohead
set arrow from -100,-100 to -100,100 nohead
set arrow from -100,100 to 100,100 nohead
set arrow from 100,-100 to 100,100 nohead
plot   '-' using 1:2 with lines title 'best global attractor footprints', '-' using 1:2 title 'positions', '-' using 1:2 title 'local attractors', '-' using 1:2 title 'global attractors'
